name: Dodgeball Dungeon (Beta v1.0)
description:
A small couch competitive game where you all enter into a Dodgeball arena and try to be the last one alive. 

This is the first publicly available test of the game it's still only in early development and it has a while to go before it's finished. 

This game is designed to be played with other people, however, it does have bots that you can face if you want to play solo. Adding more people will completely change the feel of the game so try it with each 2, 3, and 4 people.

Shoot again to pull the bullet back to you.

Controlls (Xbox controller recommended):

Controller

Move with left joystick or Dpad

Aim with right joystick

shoot with A or Right trigger

Keyboard 

WASD or ARROWS to move

Aim with mouse

shoot with space
